title: Dee Zee Tech Tips: Tailgate Assist Installation - #DZ43100
description:
In today's tech tip episode, we show how easy it is to install a Dee Zee Tailgate Assist onto a Chevy '99-'06 (as well as '07 classic). Use these simple tips to make your installation a breeze!

Learn more about our Tailgate Assists at:
http://goo.gl/1LJTrZ
